name: Hollowfang Gorge
description: The trees twist as they lean inward, forming a shrouded path into the gorge. The deeper you go, the quieter it gets — until silence itself feels like a presence. Shadows flit between the trees, and claw marks line the bark. Something waits.

story_actions.story_text: Examine claw marks on a narrow tree trunk. Fresh. Deep.
Follow pawprints that vanish and reappear in unnatural patterns.
Discover an ancient glyph carved into a stone, surrounded by wolf fur.
You study the glyphs. The sigil from the chapel flashes in your mind. These are not warnings, but bindings. The shapes begin to align. You understand.
You stare at the glyphs, but their patterns twist away from understanding. Whatever they once meant, that meaning is lost to you.
You approach a narrow cave entrance. Glyphs line the walls. They shimmer slightly as you draw near. The way is open.
Touch the Silent Stone. Visions flood your mind — wolves circling, ancient fire, your own reflection staring back from another life.
You come to a rise where the trees open slightly. The Pale Alpha emerges — tall, spectral, and quiet. It does not attack. It watches. And waits.
You hear a low growl before you see the gleam of fangs. The Pale Alpha lunges from the shadows. There will be no peace. Only survival.
